Operasi Berantas Premanisme, Polres Jakut Amankan 145 Orang
07 Nov 2019, 18:58 by Lisye Sri Rahayu
Jakarta - Polres Metro Jakarta Utara (Jakut) menggelar operasi pemberantasan premanisme. Ada 145 orang yang diamankan dalam tiga hari operasi dan 48 orang yang kemudian diproses lebih lanjut serta ditahan.
Kasat Reskrim Polres Metro Jakarta Utara Kompol Wirdhanto Hadicaksono menjelaskan, operasi pemberantasan premanisme ini digelar tiga hari mulai 5 hingga 7 November 2019. Polisi bergerak ke berbagai wilayah di Jakarta Utara yang dicurigai atau dilaporkan warga ada aktivitas premanisme.
"Total jumlah yang diamankan ada 145 orang. Dari jumlah itu ada 48 orang yang ditahan dan 97 orang lainnya terkait kasus premanisme kami lakukan pembinaan agar tidak mengulangi perbuatannya," kata Wirdhanto dalam keterangannya, Kamis (7/11/2019).
48 orang yang ditahan ini terkait sejumlah kasus. Mulai dari kasus pencurian, perjudian, penganiayaan, narkotika, pungli. Ada juga yang terjerat kasus Undang-Undang Perlindungan Anak hingga kepemilikan airsoft gun. Sementara 97 orang lainnya diringkus terkait premanisme.
"Sebanyak 97 orang yang diringkus sebagian besar pak ogah, parkir liar dan pengamen. Mereka-mereka yang diproses lebih lanjut adalah yang melakukan pemerasan dan pungli," ujar Wirdhanto.
Dari kasus-kasus tersebut, polisi menyita sejumlah barang bukti. Di antaranya 8 buah senjata tajam, 1 unit airsoft gun, 1 set alat judi koprok, 7 dus berisi 500 botol miras, 1 alat bong dan 2 plastik klip sabu, 3 kunci leter T, 4 unit handphone hingga 4 set kartu remi.
Wirdhanto menambahkan operasi pemberantasan premanisme ini dilaksanakan untuk memberi rasa aman kepada masyarakat. Polres Metro Jakut nantinya akan terus memonitor dan menindak segala bentuk aksi premanisme.
"Polres Metro Jakarta Utara akan terus memberantas segala bentuk premanisme yang terjadi di wilayah Jakarta Utara. Giat ini merupakan giat rutin kepolisian yang akan terus ditingkatkan untuk memberi rasa aman kepada masyarakat dalam menjalankan aktivitas," ujarnya.

Operation to Fight Thugs, North Jakarta Police Secure 145 People
Nov 7 2019, 18:58 by Lisye Sri Rahayu
Jakarta - North Jakarta Metro Police (North Jakarta) held an operation to eradicate thuggery. There were 145 people who were secured within three days of operation and 48 people who were further processed and detained.
Kasat Reskrim North Jakarta Metro Police Commissioner Wirdhanto Hadicaksono explained, the thuggery eradication operation was held three days from 5 to 7 November 2019. The police moved to various areas in North Jakarta that were suspected or reported by residents of thuggery activities.
"The total number that has been secured is 145 people. Of that number 48 people have been detained and 97 others related to cases of thuggery, we are conducting guidance so as not to repeat their actions," Wirdhanto said in his statement on Thursday (11/07/2019).
The 48 people arrested were related to a number of cases. Ranging from cases of theft, gambling, persecution, narcotics, extortion. There are also those who are ensnared in cases of the Child Protection Act and the ownership of airsoft gun. While 97 other people were arrested related to thuggery.
"As many as 97 people were arrested, mostly unwilling, illegal parking and buskers. Those who were further processed were extortion and extortion," said Wirdhanto.
From these cases, the police confiscated a number of items of evidence. Among them are 8 sharp weapons, 1 unit of airsoft gun, 1 set of Koprok gambling equipment, 7 boxes containing 500 alcohol bottles, 1 bong tool and 2 plastic methamphetamine clips, 3 T leter keys, 4 mobile units to 4 sets of playing cards.
Wirdhanto added that the thuggery eradication operation was carried out to provide security to the community. North Jakarta Metro Police will continue to monitor and crack down on all forms of thuggery.
"North Jakarta Metro Police will continue to eradicate all forms of thuggery that occur in the North Jakarta region. This activity is a routine routine of the police that will continue to be improved to provide security to the community in carrying out activities," he said.

(hurdy / day)
